#Objects

A point
B point
C point
D point
E point
G point
H point

LAB line
LCH line
LCE line
LCG line

CC circle

#Relations

end_points(A,B,LAB)
not_coincident(C,LAB)

left_of(C,LAB)
right_of(D,LAB)

centre(C,CC)
coincident(D,CC)

coincident(E,CC)
coincident(G,CC)

coincident(E,LAB)
coincident(G,LAB)

end_points(C,H,LCH)
coincident(H,LAB)

end_points(C,E,LCE)
end_points(C,G,LCG)

length_equal(LCE,LCG)
